Shizuka...\""},{"lineNumber":121232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マーーリア♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maaaaria♪\""},{"lineNumber":121233,"originalJapaneseLine":"どさーっとナギが背後からマリアに抱きつく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagi suddenly hugs Maria from behind."},{"lineNumber":121234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、ふふ、どうしたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, hehe, what's the stop pinching my belly fat!\""},{"lineNumber":121238,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やだ、是が非でもつまむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No way, I'm definitely going to pinch weight.\""},{"lineNumber":121243,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マリアはぽっちゃりしてる方が可愛いよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria looks cuter when she's a bit chubby.\""},{"lineNumber":121244,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなどこかで聞いたようなこと言ってぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're saying things I've heard somewhere Shizuka."},{"lineNumber":121249,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それで、これからどうするの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what are you going to do from now right?\""},{"lineNumber":121251,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの子は私が引き取るわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll take that child in.\""},{"lineNumber":121252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まあ、そうなるわよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well, that's how it will be.\""},{"lineNumber":121253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいの？　そんな簡単に」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it okay? So easily?\""},{"lineNumber":121254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それじゃあどこかの施設にでもあの子入れる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, would you put that child in some facility?\""},{"lineNumber":121255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……それよりはマシか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... that might be better than that...\""},{"lineNumber":121256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしていけばいいのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know how I should go about it,"},{"lineNumber":121257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　分からないことばかりだけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"there are so many things I don't understand...\""},{"lineNumber":121258,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、どうにかなるでしょ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it'll work out somehow.\""},{"lineNumber":121259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに、どうにかするわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides, I'll make it work.\""},{"lineNumber":121260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私にたった一人の残された家族だもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She's the only family I have left.\""},{"lineNumber":121261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":121262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこまで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To that extent...\""},{"lineNumber":121263,"originalJapaneseLine":"　覚悟が決まってるのね」","translatedEnglishLine":"you're truly resolved.\""},{"lineNumber":121264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、あの子には……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, for that child...\""},{"lineNumber":121265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出来るだけ普通の人生を……","translatedEnglishLine":"I want her to have as normal a life as possible...\""},{"lineNumber":121266,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人並みの人生を歩んで欲しいから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Because I want her to live an ordinary life.\""},{"lineNumber":121267,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その為なら、本当になんでもするつもり」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For that reason, I'm truly willing to do anything.\""},{"lineNumber":121268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、そっか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I see.\""},{"lineNumber":121269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……分かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Got it.\""},{"lineNumber":121270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達も力になるから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We'll help you too,"},{"lineNumber":121271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　困ったことがあったらなんでも相談してね」","translatedEnglishLine":"so if you have any troubles, don't hesitate to ask.\""},{"lineNumber":121272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ありがとう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thank you.\""},{"lineNumber":121273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きっと頼りにさせてもらう。色々と」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sure I'll be relying on you. For many things.\""},{"lineNumber":121274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":121275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, what?\""},{"lineNumber":121276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、うぅん、なんでもないの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, n-no, it's nothing.\""},{"lineNumber":121277,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あの志津香が他人に","translatedEnglishLine":"(For Shizuka to rely on others this honestly...)"},{"lineNumber":121278,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな素直に頼るなんて……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(It's really something...)"},{"lineNumber":121279,"originalJapaneseLine":"（それだけ、大事なのね……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(That much, she must really care...)\""},{"lineNumber":121280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、なんでも頼って。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, rely on me for anything."},{"lineNumber":121281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一人でどこかへ行かれるより……","translatedEnglishLine":"It's better than going somewhere on your own..."},{"lineNumber":121282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頼ってもらえる方が嬉しいから」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m happier if you can count on me.\""},{"lineNumber":121283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　え、ええ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Eh, yes.\""},{"lineNumber":121284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、結婚もしてないのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, even though she’s not married,"},{"lineNumber":121285,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの志津香が子供抱えたお母さんかー」","translatedEnglishLine":"that Shizuka is now a mother with a child— huh.\""},{"lineNumber":121286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、今は志津香も子供だったね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, but Shizuka was also a child just now.\""},{"lineNumber":121287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まだ言う気？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Are you still going to say that?\""},{"lineNumber":121288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、すみません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":121289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　謝るからもうお仕置きはしないで」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm apologizing, so please don't punish me anymore.\""},{"lineNumber":121290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねえ、ところで、志津香。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, by the way, Shizuka."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どさーっとナギが背後からマリアに抱きつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagi suddenly hugs Maria from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、お腹のお肉つまもうとするのやめてー！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way, I'm definitely going to pinch it."
"Why are you so stubborn about that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、最近ちょっと油断気味で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I've been a bit careless lately..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対また痩せてやるんだからぁ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh, I don't want you to lose weight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアはぽっちゃりしてる方が可愛いよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria looks cuter when she's a bit chubby."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなどこかで聞いたようなこと言ってぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're saying things I've heard somewhere before..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場内の休憩スペースで、
マリアとナギの方を見ていたランが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ran, who was watching Maria and Nagi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで、これからどうするの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what are you going to do from now on?"
"There's nothing to do about it, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子は私が引き取るわ」
「それじゃあどこかの施設にでもあの子入れる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, would you put that child in some facility?"
"Well... that might be better than that..."
"I don't know how I should go about it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分からないことばかりだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are so many things I don't understand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、どうにかなるでしょ」
「私にたった一人の残された家族だもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She's the only family I have left."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 覚悟が決まってるのね」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want her to have as normal a life as possible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人並みの人生を歩んで欲しいから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I want her to live an ordinary life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その為なら、本当になんでもするつもり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For that reason, I'm truly willing to do anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困ったことがあったらなんでも相談してね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so if you have any troubles, don't hesitate to ask."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きっと頼りにさせてもらう。色々と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sure I'll be relying on you. For many things."
(For Shizuka to rely on others this honestly...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな素直に頼るなんて……）
一人でどこかへ行かれるより……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better than going somewhere on your own...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼ってもらえる方が嬉しいから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m happier if you can count on me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの志津香が子供抱えたお母さんかー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that Shizuka is now a mother with a child— huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、今は志津香も子供だったね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but Shizuka was also a child just now."
"...Are you still going to say that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謝るからもうお仕置きはしないで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm apologizing, so please don't punish me anymore."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どさーっとナギが背後からマリアに抱きつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagi suddenly hugs Maria from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、お腹のお肉つまもうとするのやめてー！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way, I'm definitely going to pinch it."
"Why are you so stubborn about that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう、最近ちょっと油断気味で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I've been a bit careless lately..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対また痩せてやるんだからぁ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh, I don't want you to lose weight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアはぽっちゃりしてる方が可愛いよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria looks cuter when she's a bit chubby."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなどこかで聞いたようなこと言ってぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're saying things I've heard somewhere before..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場内の休憩スペースで、
マリアとナギの方を見ていたランが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ran, who was watching Maria and Nagi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで、これからどうするの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what are you going to do from now on?"
"There's nothing to do about it, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子は私が引き取るわ」
「それじゃあどこかの施設にでもあの子入れる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, would you put that child in some facility?"
"Well... that might be better than that..."
"I don't know how I should go about it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分からないことばかりだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are so many things I don't understand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、どうにかなるでしょ」
「私にたった一人の残された家族だもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She's the only family I have left."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 覚悟が決まってるのね」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want her to have as normal a life as possible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人並みの人生を歩んで欲しいから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I want her to live an ordinary life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その為なら、本当になんでもするつもり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For that reason, I'm truly willing to do anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困ったことがあったらなんでも相談してね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so if you have any troubles, don't hesitate to ask."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きっと頼りにさせてもらう。色々と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sure I'll be relying on you. For many things."
(For Shizuka to rely on others this honestly...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな素直に頼るなんて……）
一人でどこかへ行かれるより……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better than going somewhere on your own...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼ってもらえる方が嬉しいから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m happier if you can count on me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの志津香が子供抱えたお母さんかー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that Shizuka is now a mother with a child— huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、今は志津香も子供だったね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but Shizuka was also a child just now."
"...Are you still going to say that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謝るからもうお仕置きはしないで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm apologizing, so please don't punish me anymore."
